Gatherer:Centralize.NAME: Centralize
Gatherer:Centralize.DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! card from draw pile and place it into your hand.
Gatherer:Centralize.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose !M! cards from draw pile and place them into your hand.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Once_ : Upgrade them for the combat.
NL Once_: Upgrade it for the combat.

Gatherer:SpareBottle.NAME: Spare Bottle
Gatherer:SpareBottle.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a Potion, gain !M! Block and deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

Gatherer:AcidicSpray.NAME: Acidic Spray
Gatherer:AcidicSpray.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak. Deal !D! damage per total amount of debuffs on the target.

Gatherer:BambuSword.NAME: Bambu Sword
Gatherer:BambuSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Play a basic Strike or Defend from your hand with no cost.

Gatherer:GrassHammer.NAME: Grass Hammer
Gatherer:GrassHammer.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Deal !M! damage to a random enemy other than the target.

Gatherer:BigPouch.NAME: Big Pouch
Gatherer:BigPouch.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. Gain Block equal to total cost of your cards in hand. (Not affected by powers)

Gatherer:FloralFalling.NAME: Floral Falling
Gatherer:FloralFalling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Exhaust.

Gatherer:FloralPower.NAME: Floral Power
Gatherer:FloralPower.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak, Frail, and Vulnerable. At the start of your turn, Draw !M! cards.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Weak and Frail. At the start of your turn, Draw !M! cards.
Gain !M! Weak. At the start of your turn, Draw !M! cards.
At the start of your turn, Draw !M! cards.

Gatherer:Nutrients.NAME: Nutrients
Gatherer:Nutrients.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When obtained, upgrade ALL your Floral cards.

Gatherer:Photoscythe.NAME: Photoscythe
Gatherer:Photoscythe.DESCRIPTION: Upgrade ALL your Floral cards for the combat. Deal !M! damage for each of them. Exhaust.
Gatherer:Photoscythe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Upgrade ALL your Floral cards for the combat. Deal !M! damage for each of them. Exhaust.

Gatherer:CollectorsShot.NAME: Collector's Shot
Gatherer:CollectorsShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! X number of unique cards in your deck.
Gatherer:CollectorsShot.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Deal damage equal to !M! X number of unique cards in your deck.

Gatherer:Bulldoze.NAME: Bulldoze
Gatherer:Bulldoze.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for every !M! unique cards in your discard pile.

Gatherer:FruitForce.NAME: Fruit Force
Gatherer:FruitForce.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to !M! % of Max HP. When obtained, raise your Max HP by 4.

Gatherer:GlowingPlant.NAME: Glowing Plant
Gatherer:GlowingPlant.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card for each Glow_Power. NL Gain 1 Glow_Power. NL When obtained, add Light! and Shadow! to your deck.
Gatherer:GlowingPlant.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Glow_Power. NL Draw 1 card for each Glow_Power. NL When obtained, add a Light! and a Shadow! to your deck.

Gatherer:Light.NAME: Light!
Gatherer:Light.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Block is increased by 100% for each Glow_Power. NL Gain 1 Glow_Power.

Gatherer:Shadow.NAME: Shadow!
Gatherer:Shadow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Damage is increased by 100% for each Glow_Power. NL Gain 1 Glow_Power.

Gatherer:CoupDeGrace.NAME: Coup De Grace
Gatherer:CoupDeGrace.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If the enemyâ€™s current HP was less than yours, hit twice instead.

Gatherer:RecoveryHerb.NAME: Recovery Herb
Gatherer:RecoveryHerb.DESCRIPTION: Add a Recovery Potion to your Sack. NL It heals !M! % of your missing HP. NL Exhaust.
Gatherer:RecoveryHerb.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add a Recovery Potion+ to your Sack. NL It heals !M! % of your missing HP. NL Exhaust.

Gatherer:TreeGrowth.NAME: Tree Growth
Gatherer:TreeGrowth.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! Block 2 turns later.

Gatherer:CarefulStrike.NAME: Careful Strike
Gatherer:CarefulStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. You may put !M! card on top of your deck.

Gatherer:Duality.NAME: Duality
Gatherer:Duality.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Retain. When Retained, it switches between Attack and Skill.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Retain. When Retained, it switches between Attack and Skill.

Gatherer:Snatch.NAME: Snatch
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Twice_: Add a random lesser potion to your Sack.
NL Once_: Add a random lesser potion to your Sack.

Gatherer:QuickSynthesis.NAME: Quick Synthesis
Gatherer:QuickSynthesis.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random lesser potion to your Sack. NL Exhaust.
Gatherer:QuickSynthesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add !M! random lesser potion to your Sack. NL Exhaust.

Gatherer:FlamingBottle.NAME: Flaming Bottle
Gatherer:FlamingBottle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a Lesser_Fire_Potion to your Sack.

Gatherer:PoisonMastery.NAME: Poison Mastery
Gatherer:PoisonMastery.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Lesser_Poison_Potion to your Sack. Poison damage is increased by 50% this combat.

Gatherer:Pollute.NAME: Pollute
Gatherer:Pollute.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, apply !M! Poison, Weak and Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Gatherer:Herbalism.NAME: Herbalism
Gatherer:Herbalism.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] for each card in your hand that costs 2 or more.

Gatherer:Convert.NAME: Convert
Gatherer:Convert.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card. If it is [#60B0C0]Uncommon,[] gain !B! Block. If it is [#FFC050]Rare,[] gain !M! Block.

Gatherer:ScentOfRosmari.NAME: Scent of Rosmari
Gatherer:ScentOfRosmari.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. Choose up to !M! card, which are returned to your hand from draw or discard pile next turn.
Gatherer:ScentOfRosmari.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. Choose up to !M! cards, which are returned to your hand from draw or discard pile next turn.

Gatherer:WoolGloves.NAME: Wool Gloves
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Twice_: Draw 2 cards, then discard 2 cards.
NL Once_: Draw 2 cards, then discard 2 cards.

Gatherer:SaveValuables.NAME: Save Valuables
Gatherer:SaveValuables.DESCRIPTION: Choose up to !M! cards from your discard pile. Shuffle them into your draw pile.

Gatherer:EchoOfNature.NAME: Echo of Nature
Gatherer:EchoOfNature.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block X times. Deal !D! Damage X times.

Gatherer:StarFruit.NAME: Star Fruit
Gatherer:StarFruit.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to half of your missing HP.
Gatherer:StarFruit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to 6+ half of your missing HP.

Gatherer:HeartToFruit.NAME: Heart to Fruit
Gatherer:HeartToFruit.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this kills a non-minion enemy, raise your Max HP by !M!; doubled for Elites & Bosses. Exhaust.

Gatherer:SalvePotion.NAME: Salve Potion
Gatherer:SalvePotion.DESCRIPTION: Considered as using a Potion. Heal !M! HP. Decrease this card's healing by 1 this combat.

Gatherer:Frenzy.NAME: Frenzy
Gatherer:Frenzy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Vulnerable. Add 2 Dazed to your discard pile.

Gatherer:WitheringStrike.NAME: Withering Strike
Gatherer:WitheringStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Enemy loses 1 Strength down to !M!.

Gatherer:VenomBarrier.NAME: Venom Barrier
Gatherer:VenomBarrier.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply !M! Poison to the attacker.

Gatherer:Transmute.NAME: Transmute
Gatherer:Transmute.DESCRIPTION: Transform a card from your hand. It costs 0 this turn.
Gatherer:Transmute.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Transform a card from your hand. It is upgraded and costs 0 this turn.

Gatherer:BalancedGrowth.NAME: Balanced Growth
Gatherer:BalancedGrowth.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain 1 Strength or Dexterity until they are equal.

Gatherer:Liquidism.NAME: Liquidism
Gatherer:Liquidism.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a Potion, gain 1 Strength or Dexterity randomly.
Gatherer:Liquidism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you use a Potion, gain 1 Strength or Dexterity randomly.

Gatherer:BomberForm.NAME: Bomber Form
Gatherer:BomberForm.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a LEP. Any incoming lesser Potion becomes LEP, and increases damage of all LEPs by !M!.

Gatherer:Solidify.NAME: Solidify
Gatherer:Solidify.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you have !M! or more Block, reduce it by 5 and add Lesser_Block_Potion to your Sack.

Gatherer:ChargingShot.NAME: Charging Shot
Gatherer:ChargingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. While in your hand, using a Potion increases its damage by !M! this combat.

Gatherer:SealedBomb.NAME: Sealed Bomb
Gatherer:SealedBomb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. While in your hand, using a Potion decreases its cost by 1 this combat.

Gatherer:FeelingFine.NAME: Feeling Fine
Gatherer:FeelingFine.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use 4 Potions in a turn, remove all of your debuffs.

Gatherer:CursedBlade.NAME: Cursed Blade
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: NL Twice_: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. When Obtained, become [#FF6563]Cursed [#FF6563]- [#FF6563]Normality.
NL Once_: Enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. When Obtained, become [#FF6563]Cursed [#FF6563]- [#FF6563]Normality.

Gatherer:Overflowing.NAME: Overflowing
Gatherer:Overflowing.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E]. NL Energy is conserved for the next turn. NL Exhaust.
Gatherer:Overflowing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E] [E] [E]. NL Energy is conserved for the next turn. NL Exhaust.

Gatherer:ScrollOfWall.NAME: Scroll Of Wall
Gatherer:ScrollOfWall.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Use a Potion to Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted.
Gatherer:ScrollOfWall.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Use a Potion to Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted and give 1 Plated Armor.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted.
Unplayable. Retain this turn. All incoming Statuses are Exhausted and give 1 Plated Armor up to 5.

Gatherer:ScrollOfPurity.NAME: Scroll of Purity
Gatherer:ScrollOfPurity.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Whenever you use a Potion, you may exhaust a card and draw !M! card.
Gatherer:ScrollOfPurity.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. Whenever you use a Potion, you may exhaust a card and draw !M! cards.

Gatherer:Examine.NAME: Examine
Gatherer:Examine.DESCRIPTION: Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. Play one, and discard others.

Gatherer:Uplift.NAME: Uplift
Gatherer:Uplift.DESCRIPTION: The first card played each turn that costs 2 or more gives you [E] .

Gatherer:SmartManeuver.NAME: Smart Maneuver
Gatherer:SmartManeuver.DESCRIPTION: Enemy deals half damage this turn. Next turn, draw !M! cards.
Gatherer:SmartManeuver.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Enemy deals half damage this turn. Next turn, draw !M! cards. NL Retain.

Gatherer:Misfortune.NAME: Misfortune
Gatherer:Misfortune.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If it is Weakened, add a Lesser_Weak_Potion to your sack.
Gatherer:Misfortune.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If it is Weakened or Vulnerable, add a Lesser_Weak_Potion or Lesser_Fear_Potion to your sack, respectively.

Gatherer:EnergyBasket.NAME: Energy Basket
Gatherer:EnergyBasket.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Lesser_Energy_Potion to your Sack. NL Retain. Exhaust.

Gatherer:Polymorphism.NAME: Polymorphism
Gatherer:Polymorphism.DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to number of other cards in your hand. If they are all unique, gain [E] and draw a card.
Gatherer:Polymorphism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal damage equal to number of other cards in your hand +3. If they are all unique, gain [E] and draw a card.

Gatherer:Enchant.NAME: Enchant
Gatherer:Enchant.DESCRIPTION: Choose a Strike card from your hand. It costs 1 more and deals !M! more damage for the rest of the combat.

Gatherer:HandcraftedFence.NAME: Handcrafted Fence
Gatherer:HandcraftedFence.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 Repair to your hand. NL (Does not stack.)
Gatherer:HandcraftedFence.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add 1 upgraded Repair to your hand. NL (Does not stack.)

Gatherer:Repair.NAME: Repair
Gatherer:Repair.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Gain Block equal to amount expired this turn. Exhaust.
Gatherer:Repair.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Gain Block equal to amount expired this turn +3. Exhaust.

Gatherer:ColorfulGarden.NAME: Colorful Garden
Gatherer:ColorfulGarden.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block per unique card you played this turn.
Gatherer:ColorfulGarden.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block per unique card you played this turn.

Gatherer:MiningStrike.NAME: Mining Strike
Gatherer:MiningStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. For every !M! unblocked damage, gain 1 Plated Armor.

Gatherer:GatherMaterial.NAME: Gather Material
Gatherer:GatherMaterial.DESCRIPTION: Put !M! random unique cards from your draw pile into your hand.
